ISSUE.TITLE: dynamic is not working
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi team, first of all star to your efforts <3 I am sending an post request to dynamic api, but system is not response as required as it through 404 error, ajax code: `$(document).ready(function(){ $.ajax({ url: 'http://127.0.0.1:3000/dynamic', method: 'POST', data:{ "query": "select * from ?? limit 20", "params": ["issuedetailsv3"] }, success: function (data){ console.log(data); }, error : function (){ console.log('this is an error'); } }) });` following errors, > POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/dynamic 404 (Not Found) > POST /dynamic 404 147 - 3.395 ms Please provide dev environment versions of your system node -v v9.0.0 ( xmysql requires node >= 7.6.0 ) npm -v 5.5.1 mysql --version 5.7.20 xmysql --version 0.2.0 - - - Provide steps to reproduce this issue or Provide minimum code to reproduce this issue or HTTP request,response,error snapshot of this issue - - - Mark issue with suitable label if it is clear what this issue is.
